// SignInPage.js import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './signin.css'; import logo from '../assets/logo.png'; function SignInPage() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ permanentAddress: '', residentialAddress: '', contactHome: '', contactPersonal1: '', contactPersonal2: '', email: '', district: '', fullName: '', nameWithInitials: '', nic: '', passport: '', drivingLicense: '', age: '', maritalStatus: '', policeDomain: '', gramasewakaArea: '', scannedNic: null, scannedBirthCertificate: null, recentPhotograph: null }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: value }); }; const handleFileChange = (e) => { const { name, files } = e.target; setFormData({ ...formData, [name]: files[0] }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add form submission logic here console.log(formData); }; return (

); } export default SignInPage;
